content:
To enable it in your IG, add the following:
<parameter> <code value="shownav"/> <value value="true"/> </parameter>

Feedback on when HL7 IGs should/should not be expected to have this enabled, as well as for how to improve the appearance of the indicators on #committers
I can confirm it goes away... and will come back with this parameter. Thanks
I will be using it for the IG being written and converted in IHE ITI.
